file_content.text: You heard Ganuk. You're job's done here. Thanks for the help.
Stop Vergost. He'll keep killing Evocii long as he's in control.
Nice moves. Thought I was gonna be sick if those Imperials touched me one more time.
I'm Kalda Biss. Republic agent. Ganuk send you?
I took down the chemical plant for him.
That's right.
Good thing he found you. His cause is running out of time.
You're the one he sent into the chemical plant?
You Ganuk's missing agent?
That's right. Didn't think he'd find a replacement so fast.
I'm shutting this factory down. That's all you need to know.
No time for questions.
Suit yourself. If you want to break this place, you gotta go after its leader.
Vergost, the commander here, he's a real monster. Once you hit the chemical plant, he stepped up the slaughter.
Now Vergost's holed up in his command post, killing Evocii as part of his genocide program. You've got to take him down!
I can sense the Evocii's suffering. This ends now.
It will be done.
Good deal. I'll get some Republic support and meet up with you.
He'll answer for every alien life he's taken.
Vergost will pay.
I wish that were possible. Find him quick. I'll get us Republic backup.
You're right! I'm the only one with the skills to end this atrocity.
He's no match for my talent.
Just back those words up with action. I'll get us some Republic support.
What genocide program?
Genocide program?
Something about the Empire wiping out non-humans. Whatever the specifics, you've got to stop them.
Take out Vergost before more Evocii die. I'll call in Republic support.
I've been raring for a brawl.
That's the idea. Take out Vergost quick, and I'll call in Republic support.
One more note: The commander has some guests, Imperial bigwigs who enjoy torturing aliens.
They're prime targets, haven't been this vulnerable in years. If you see 'em, put a blaster bolt between their eyes.
Now hurry! Stop Vergost, and his genocide program's toast!
